roleset.name: drunk
roleset.note: HAMMERED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on abbreviated instance in BOLT. (from hammered.01-j)
HAMMED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from hammed.01-j)

example.name: hammered
example.text: At the reception Caine got hammered on barley wine with his fathcr~in-law and spent much of the festivities under the table with him.

example.name: hammed
example.text: Haha you-1 might have wanted to not *-1 be hammed but I think it will get the point across good job I was hoping you guys would at least try
